inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('SpellCooldown', 'Stackable', 1); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Fast Spell Recovery II
description: You can cast spells more often than other spell casters.  Cooldowns for all of your spells are reduced by a further round for a total of 2 rounds.
